mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Willis, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Boston, Lawrence Co., Ohio [Boston, Lawrence County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Willis, George Patient Age: 27. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left leg. Laceration of integument inner aspect 4 inches above ankle joint. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Treatment: Simple dressings = cold water. Tonics and stimulants escoraties. Creosote and olivari to wound = simple curate. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital at Parkersburg, VA [West Virginia].
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Willis, George
Gun shot flesh wound left leg. Laceration of integument inner aspect 4 inches above ankle joint
